parameter.name: argCollection

parameter.name: interceptorName
parameter.help: The name of the interceptor to search for

parameter.help: By default we search the cache for the interceptor reference. If true, we search all the registered interceptor states for a match.

function.name: relocate

parameter.name: postProcessExempt
parameter.help: Do not fire the postProcess interceptors

function.name: setfwLocale
function.help: Set the default locale to use in the framework for a specific user. Utility Method (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: locale
parameter.help: The locale to change and set. Must be Java Style: en_US

parameter.name: dontloadRBFlag
parameter.help: Flag to load the resource bundle for the specified locale (If not already loaded) or just change the framework's locale. Boolean

function.name: getDatasource
function.help: I will return to you a datasourceBean according to the alias of the datasource you wish to get from the configstruct (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: alias
parameter.help: The alias of the datasource to get from the configstruct (alias property in the config file)

function.name: getController
function.help: Get controller: coldbox.system.web.Controller (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

function.help: Facade for cfmx dump (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: isAbort
parameter.help: Abort also

function.name: getModel
function.help: Create or retrieve model objects by convention (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: The name of the model to retrieve

parameter.name: useSetterInjection
parameter.help: Whether to use setter injection alongside the annotations property injection. cfproperty injection takes precedence. Boolean

parameter.name: onDICompleteUDF
parameter.help: After Dependencies are injected, this method will look for this UDF and call it if it exists. The default value is onDIComplete

parameter.name: stopRecursion
parameter.help: A comma-delimmited list of stoprecursion classpaths.

parameter.name: dsl
parameter.help: The dsl string to use to retrieve the domain object

parameter.name: executeInit
parameter.help: Whether to execute the init() constructor or not. Defaults to execute, Boolean

parameter.name: initArguments
parameter.help: The constructor structure of arguments to passthrough when initializing the instance. Only available for WireBox integration

function.name: renderLayout
function.help: Renders the current layout + view Combinations if declared. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: layout
parameter.help: The explicit layout to use in rendering.

parameter.name: view
parameter.help: The name of the view to passthrough as an argument so you can refer to it as arguments.view

parameter.name: module
parameter.help: Explicitly render a layout from this module

function.name: renderView
function.help: Facade to plugin's render view. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: cache
parameter.help: True if you want to cache the view.

parameter.name: cacheTimeout
parameter.help: The cache timeout

parameter.name: cacheLastAccessTimeout
parameter.help: The last access timeout

parameter.name: cacheSuffix
parameter.help: Add a cache suffix to the view cache entry. Great for multi-domain caching or i18n caching.

parameter.name: module
parameter.help: Explicitly render a layout from this module

function.help: Locate the real path location of a file in a coldbox application. 3 checks: 1) inside of coldbox app, 2) expand the path, 3) Absolute location. If path not found, it returns an empty path (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.help: The path to check

function.help: Facade (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

function.name: getMemento
function.help: Get the memento of this object (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

function.name: setNextRoute
function.help: This method is now deprecated, please use setNextEvent(). This method will be removed later on (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: route
parameter.help: The route to relocate to, do not prepend the baseURL or /.

parameter.name: persist
parameter.help: What request collection keys to persist in the relocation

parameter.name: persistStruct
parameter.help: A structure key-value pairs to persist.

parameter.name: addToken
parameter.help: Wether to add the tokens or not. Default is false

parameter.name: ssl
parameter.help: Whether to relocate in SSL or not

function.name: setNextEvent
function.help: Facade (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: event
parameter.help: The name of the event to run, if not passed, then it will use the default event found in your configuration file.

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.help: The query string to append, if needed. If in SES mode it will be translated to convention name value pairs

parameter.name: addToken
parameter.help: Wether to add the tokens or not. Default is false

parameter.name: persist
parameter.help: What request collection keys to persist in flash ram

parameter.name: persistStruct
parameter.help: A structure key-value pairs to persist in flash ram.

parameter.name: ssl
parameter.help: Whether to relocate in SSL or not

parameter.name: baseURL
parameter.help: Use this baseURL instead of the index.cfm that is used by default. You can use this for ssl or any full base url you would like to use. Ex: https://mysite.com/index.cfm

parameter.name: postProcessExempt
parameter.help: Do not fire the postProcess interceptors

parameter.name: URL
parameter.help: The full URL you would like to relocate to instead of an event: ex: URL='http://www.google.com'

parameter.name: URI
parameter.help: The relative URI you would like to relocate to instead of an event: ex: URI='/mypath/awesome/here'

parameter.name: statusCode
parameter.help: The status code to use in the relocation

function.name: addAsset
function.help: Add a js/css asset(s) to the html head section. You can also pass in a list of assets. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: asset
parameter.help: The asset to load, only js or css files. This can also be a comma delimmited list.

function.name: getSettingsBean
function.help: Returns a configBean with all the configuration structure. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: FWSetting
parameter.help: Whether to build the config bean with coldbox settings or config settings

function.name: includeUDF
function.help: Injects a UDF Library (*.cfc or *.udf) into the target object. It does not however, put the mixins on any of the cfc scopes. Therefore they can only be called internally. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: udflibrary
parameter.help: The UDF library to inject.

function.name: populateModel
function.help: Populate a named or instantiated model (java/cfc) from the request collection items (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: model
parameter.help: The name of the model to get and populate or the acutal model object. If you already have an instance of a model, then use the populateBean() method

parameter.name: scope
parameter.help: Use scope injection instead of setters population. Ex: scope=variables.instance.

parameter.name: trustedSetter
parameter.help: If set to true, the setter method will be called even if it does not exist in the bean

parameter.name: include
parameter.help: A list of keys to include in the population

parameter.name: exclude
parameter.help: A list of keys to exclude in the population

function.name: getResource
function.help: Facade to i18n.getResource. Returns a string. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: resource
parameter.help: The resource to retrieve from the loaded localized bundle

parameter.name: default
parameter.help: A default value to send back if resource not found

parameter.name: locale
parameter.help: Pass in which locale to take the resource from. By default it uses the user's current set locale

function.name: $htmlhead
function.help: Facade to cfhtmlhead (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: content
parameter.help: The content to send to the head

function.help: Announce an interception to the system. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: state
parameter.help: The interception state to execute

parameter.name: interceptData
parameter.help: A data structure used to pass intercepted information.

function.name: renderExternalView

parameter.name: view
parameter.help: The full path to the view. This can be an expanded path or relative. Include extension.

parameter.name: cache
parameter.help: True if you want to cache the view.

parameter.name: cacheTimeout
parameter.help: The cache timeout

parameter.name: cacheLastAccessTimeout
parameter.help: The last access timeout

parameter.name: cacheSuffix
parameter.help: Add a cache suffix to the view cache entry. Great for multi-domain caching or i18n caching.

function.name: getMailSettings
function.help: I will return to you a mailsettingsBean modeled after your mail settings in your config file. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

function.name: runEvent
function.help: Facade to controller's runEvent() method. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: prepostExempt
parameter.help: If true, pre/post handlers will not be fired. Boolean

parameter.name: private
parameter.help: Execute a private event or not, default is false

parameter.name: default
parameter.help: The flag that let's this service now if it is the default set event running or not. USED BY THE FRAMEWORK ONLY

parameter.name: eventArguments
parameter.help: A collection of arguments to passthrough to the calling event handler method. struct

function.name: locateDirectoryPath
function.help: Locate the real path location of a directory in a coldbox application. 3 checks: 1) inside of coldbox app, 2) expand the path, 3) Absolute location. If path not found, it returns an empty path (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: pathToCheck
parameter.help: The path to check

scope.help: Get the LogBox version string.
Register a new appender object in the appender registry.
Get the list of currently registered appenders.
Get a parent logger according to category convention inheritance. If not found, it returns the root logger.
Configure logbox for operation. You can also re-configure LogBox programmatically. Basically we register all appenders here and all categories
Get a map of appenders by list. Usually called to get a category of appenders.
Get the root logger
Create and return a util object
Get a logger object configured with a category name and appenders. If not configured, then it reverts to the root logger defined for this instance of LogBox
Get this LogBox's configuration object.
Constructor
Get the list of currently instantiated loggers.
Constructor
Keep all or a single flash temp variable alive for another relocation.
Change the status marks of the temp scope entries
Remove the entire flash storage
Checks if the flash storage exists and IT HAS DATA to inflate.
Get the controller reference
Clear the temp flash scope and remove all data
Save the flash storage in preparing to go to the next request
Check if the flash scope is empty or not
Get the flash temp request storage used throughout a request until flashed at the end of a request.
Get the coldbox utility class
Put an object in temp flash scope
Remove an object from flash scope
Persist keys from the coldbox request collection in flash scope. If using exclude, then it will try to persist the entire rc but excluding. Including will only include the keys passed.
Inflate the flash storage into the request collection and request temp storage
Check if an object exists in flash scope
Put a map of name-value pairs into the flash scope
Get the flash storage structure to inflate it.
Clear the flash storage
Get a list of all the objects in the temp flash scope
Get the size of the items in flash scope
Get an object from flash scope
Mark for discard all or a single flash temp variable for another relocation. You can also remove them if you like.
Map to a webservice destination class path.
Create a mapping to an object
Register a new custom dsl namespace
Used to set the current working mapping name in place for the maping DSL. An exception is thrown if the mapping does not exist yet.
The methods to execute once DI completes on the mapping
Create a new binding property
Get the parent injector reference this binder is linked to
Constructor: You can pass a data CFC instance, data CFC path or nothing at all for purely programmatic configuration
Load a data configuration CFC data DSL
Get the current set mapping (UTILITY method)
Integrate with CacheBox
Maps an entire instantiation path directory, please note that the unique name of each file will be used and also processed for alias inspection
Register a new WireBox custom scope
Get the linked map of package scan locations for CFCs
Map a setter function to a mapping
Get the binded properties structure
Get the scope registration details structure
Process all registered mappings, called by injector when ready to start serving requests
Get the bounded ColdBox context for this binder, if any
Get the bounded injector for this binder
Get the instance data structure
Get the ColdBox app mapping variable if context linked
Get the registered custom scopes
Check if an object mapping exists
Get all the stop recursion classes array
Link a parent injector to this configuration binder
Map to a factory and its executing method.
Get all the registered object mappings structure
Register one or more package scan locations for CFC lookups
Get the logBox Configuration file to use
Map an object into CacheBox
If this method is called, the mapped object will be created once the injector starts up. Basically, not lazy loaded
If you call this method on an object mapping, the object will NOT be inspected for injection/wiring metadata, it will use ONLY whatever you define in the mapping.
Use to define injector scope registration
Map to a dsl that will be used to create the mapped object
Positional or named value arguments to use when initializing the mapping. (CFC-only)
Map an object into a specific persistence scope
Try to remove all the scan locations passed in
Map as a singleton, shortcut to using 'in( this.SCOPES.SINGLETON )'
Get a specific object mapping: coldbox.system.ioc.config.Mapping
Get the CacheBox Configuration Integration structure
Map to a destination CFC class path.
Get the default WireBox settings structure
Set the binded properties structure
Get the custom dsl namespace registration structure
You can choose what method will be treated as the constructor. By default the value is 'init', so don't call this method if that is the case.
Map a cfproperty to a mapping
Map a method argument to a factory method
Map to a java destination class path.
Map to a constant value
Add a new listener configuration.
The main configuration method that must be overriden by a specific WireBox Binder configuration object
Reset the configuration back to the original binder defaults
If you call this method on an object mapping, the object's constructor will not be called. By default all constructors are called.
Configure the stop recursion classes
Map a constructor argument to a mapping
Get a binded property. If not found it will try to return the default value passed, else it returns an exception

Directly map to a path by using the last part of the path as the alias. This is equivalent to map('MyService').to('model.MyService'). Only use if the name of the alias is the same as the last part of the path.
Get the configured listeners array
Map to a rss destination class path.
Checks if a property exists
Set the logBox Configuration to use
Get the registered view layout associations map
Clears the entire collection
Is this a no render request
I Get a reference or deep copy of the public or private request Collection
The event name used by the application: String
Get the current routed URL that matched the SES route
Builds a link to a passed event, either SES or normal link. If the ses interceptor is declared it will create routes.
Get the raw HTTP content
Set the ses base URL for this request
Determine if you are in SES mode.
Append a structure to the collection, with overwrite or not. Overwrite = false by default
Get the registered folder layout associations map
Get the event cacheable entry
Set the isSES flag, usualy done by the SES interceptor
Use this method to tell the framework to render data for you. The framework will take care of marshalling the data for you

I Set the layout to override and render. Layouts are pre-defined in the config file. However I can override these settings if needed. Do not append a the cfm extension. Private Request Collection name: currentLayout
I return the debugpanel flag for this request.
Get's the default layout of the application: String
Get's the default view of the application: String
Gets the current set layout for rendering
Get the routed structure of key-value pairs. What the ses interceptor could match.
constructor
Facade for cfmx dump
Set an HTTP Header
I Set the view to render in this request. Private Request Collection Name: currentView, currentLayout
Get the event cacheable entry
Get all the registered layouts in the configuration file
Returns the number of elements in the collection
Set that this is a proxy request
Returns index.cfm?{eventName}= : String
Gets the current handler requested in the current event: String

I Override the current event in the request collection. This method does not execute the event, it just replaces the event to be executed by the framework's RunEvent() method. This method is usually called from an onRequestStart or onApplicationStart method.
Get the state of this request context
Just like cfparam, but for the request collection
Set the flag that tells the framework not to render, just execute
I can override to show or not the debug panel. Very useful in AJAX debugging
Gets the current set view the framework will try to render for this request
Determine if we need to execute an incoming event or not.
Check wether the incoming view has been flagged for caching
Set routed struct of key-value pairs. This is used only by the SES interceptor. Not for public use.
Returns boolean result whether current request is in ssl or not
Gets the current action requested in the current event: String
Get the HTTP Request Method Type
Gets the current module name, else returns empty string
Set that the request will not execute an incoming event. Most likely simulating a servlet call.
Get the ses base URL for this request
Override the default layout for a request
Get the current request's SES route that matched
Get the renderData structure.
Is this a coldbox proxy request
Check wether the incoming event has been flagged for caching. Boolean
Remove the cacheable entry
I Get a value from the request collection and if simple value, I will trim it.
I remove a value in the request collection
Gets the current incoming event
Get a HTTP header
I Check if a value exists in the request collection.
Set the view cacheable entry
Set the event cacheable entry
I Set a value in the request collection

Determines if in an Ajax call or not by looking at the request headers
Override the default view for a request
I Get a value from the public or private request collection.
Convenience method to get the current request's module root path. If no module, then returns empty path. You can also get this from the modules settings.
Set the state of this request context
Process provider methods on the selected target
Configure a standalone version of a WireBox Event Manager
Checks if CacheBox is linked

Get all the registered scopes structure in this injector
Inject a model object with dependencies via setters or property injections
Register all internal and configured WireBox Scopes

Get an object populator useful for populating objects from JSON,XML, etc.
Get the instance of LogBox configured for this Injector
Return the core util object
Process property and setter injection
Get the instance of CacheBox linked in this Injector. Empty if using standalone version
Get the structure of scope registration information
Register all the configured listeners in the configuration file
Get the instance of ColdBox linked in this Injector. Empty if using standalone version
Register a new requested mapping object instance
Build an instance, this is called from registered scopes only as they provide locking and transactions
Register this injector on a user specified scope
Load a configuration binder object according to passed in type
Clear the singleton cache
Get the Injector's configuration binder object
Get a reference to the parent injector instance, else an empty simple string meaning nothing is set
Configure a standalone version of cacheBox for persistence
Checks if this injector can locate a model instance or not
Link a parent Injector with this injector
Configure a standalone version of logBox for logging
I wire up target objects with dependencies either by mappings or a-la-carte autowires
Configure this injector for operation, called by the init(). You can also re-configure this injector programmatically, but it is not recommended.
Remove the Injector from scope registration if enabled, else does nothing
Checks if Coldbox application context is linked
Get a registered scope in this injector by name
Tries to locate a specific instance by scanning all scan locations and returning the instantiation path. If model not found then the returned instantiation path will be empty
Locates, Creates, Injects and Configures an object model instance
